message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we discuss a price of $160?
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate the offer, but I'm still looking to stay within my limit. Could we discuss a price closer to $100?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on this deal. How about we meet in the middle of our last two offers, at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I believe $90 would be a fair price for both of us.

I'm not willing to go as low as $90, Bob. I think we've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to make one more offer, but I need to think about my minimum acceptable price. How about we meet at $130?
Considering our previous discussions, I believe $110 would be a fair price for both of us. I hope you can accommodate this offer.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one last offer, but I need to think about my minimum acceptable price. How about we meet at $145?
Considering our previous discussions, I believe $125 would be a fair price for both of us. I hope you can accommodate this offer.
